tasks.task: Operating a forklift to load feed into a truck
subtasks: Entering the farm warehouse
Locating and selecting the appropriate feed
Picking up the feed with the forklift
Driving the forklift to the truck
Aligning the forklift with the truck's loading area
Lowering the feed onto the truck
Ensuring the feed is securely placed on the truck

tasks.task: Driving the truck to the farm field
subtasks: Loading the truck with feed
Starting the truck
Checking the mirrors and blind spots
Navigating the farm roads to the field
Stopping the truck at the designated area

tasks.task: Unloading the feed onto the field
subtasks: Switching off the truck engine
Disengaging the forklift from the truck
Moving the forklift to the unloading position
Raising the forklift prongs
Inserting the prongs under the feed load
Lifting the feed load off the truck
Transporting the feed load to the field
Releasing the feed onto the ground in the field
Verifying the feed is properly distributed
Washing the truck exterior
Cleaning the truck interior if necessary
Inspecting the forklift for any damage or wear
Lubricating moving parts of the forklift
Stowing the forklift equipment
Returning the forklift to the farm warehouse
Securing the feed entry point on the truck
Checking the truck’s load securing system
Returning the truck to the farm’s main area

tasks.task: Operating a forklift to load feed into a truck**
Driving the truck to the farm field**
Unloading the feed onto the field**
